publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4016 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Scotland’s Rugby Team - Calcutta Cup Winners—That the Parliament sends its congratulations to the Scottish Rugby team in winning the Calcutta Cup by 18-12 against England; believes that this result, together with the win against France, demonstrates the significant progress that Frank Hadden and his team of players have made in recent months, and wishes them every success in their matches against Ireland and Italy. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-4016 Congratulations to Scotland’s Rugby Team - Calcutta Cup Winners (lodged on 27 February 2006) Alex Johnstone*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Shona Robison*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, John Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Bill Butler*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Murdo Fraser*, Linda Fabiani*, Bristow Muldoon*, Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Eleanor Scott*, Phil Gallie*, Bruce Crawford*, Robin Harper*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Chris Ballance*, Karen Gillon*

S2M-4016 Congratulations to Scotland’s Rugby Team - Calcutta Cup Winners (lodged on 27 February 2006) Susan Deacon*, Fergus Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Trish Godman*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Neil*, Michael McMahon*

S2M-4016 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Scotland’s Rugby Team - Calcutta Cup Winners—That the Parliament sends its congratulations to the Scottish Rugby team in winning the Calcutta Cup by 18-12 against England; believes that this result, together with the win against France, demonstrates the significant progress that Frank Hadden and his team of players have made in recent months, and wishes them every success in their matches against Ireland and Italy. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Johnstone, Mike Pringle, Rob Gibson, Jim Mather, Mr Jamie Stone, Shona Robison, Bill Aitken, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mrs Margaret Ewing, John Scott, Mr John Swinney, Bill Butler, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Murdo Fraser, Linda Fabiani, Bristow Muldoon, Brian Adam, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Ms Sandra White, Eleanor Scott, Phil Gallie, Bruce Crawford, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Chris Ballance, Karen Gillon, Susan Deacon, Fergus Ewing, Tommy Sheridan, Nora Radcliffe, Trish Godman, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Neil, Michael McMahon
S2M-4016 Congratulations to Scotland’s Rugby Team - Calcutta Cup Winners (lodged on 27 February 2006) Christine Grahame*
